name: Arctic Bounce
description:
Arctic Bounce

Play as an eskimo as he tries to find out why he can't contact a local town. Join him as he starts to unravel the mystery and has to face whatever is revealed.

Developed by Papu Games Gameplay programming: Jesse Lintilä Art: Hanna Kenakkala UI: darkpencil1

Additional credits:

"Chopping wood 01" by micahlg

"wood_thump2" by jtn191

"Sound of the Sea" by florianreichelt

Dreamers, Reunion, Twisted Dreams Gone Wild, Uneven Fight by JDB Artist

And to Freesound for enabling us to find the music we needed.
